attributes.action: 'Institute’ Equality Act 2010, to no longer exempt all “men only" libraries.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to ‘institute’ the Equality Act 2010 as a condition of scholarship; and remove libraries from the “single characteristic associations” exemption.
attributes.background: Equality Act 2010 “single characteristic associations” exemption should be limited, and or removed, in the context of libraries and library membership. Thus, prohibiting the establishment of sex-based restrictions to libraries; as is the case of “men only” library membership.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553692
